trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Clear-Content
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content

trans-unit.source: Clear-Content
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Deletes the contents of an item, but does not delete the item.
trans-unit.target: 刪除項目的內容，但不會刪除項目。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The Clear-Content cmdlet deletes the contents of an item, such as deleting the text from a file, but it does not delete the item.
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content Cmdlet 會刪除項目的內容 (例如檔案中的文字)，但不會刪除項目。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the item exists, but it is empty.
trans-unit.target: 因此，項目會存在，但會是空的。

trans-unit.source: Clear-Content is similar to Clear-Item, but it works on items with contents, instead of items with values.
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content 與 Clear-Item 類似，但它是在含有內容的項目 (而非含有值的項目) 上作用。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command deletes all of the content from the "init.txt" files in all subdirectories of the SmpUsers directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令刪除 SmpUsers 目錄之所有子目錄中的 "init.txt" 檔案的所有內容。

trans-unit.source: The files are not deleted, but they are empty.
trans-unit.target: 檔案不會被刪除，但會是空的。

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the contents of all files in the current directory with the ".log" file name extension, including files with the read-only attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此命令刪除目前目錄中副檔名為 ".log" 之所有檔案的內容，包括具有唯讀屬性的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk (*) in the path represents all items in the current directory. The Force parameter makes the command effective on read-only files. Using a filter to restrict the command to files with the ".log" file name extension instead of specifying "*.log" in the path makes the operation faster.
trans-unit.target: 星號 (*) 的路徑中代表目前目錄中的所有項目。Force 參數可讓命令在唯讀檔案上生效。使用篩選來將命令限制在".log"的檔案副檔名，而不是指定 「*.log"路徑中可加快作業速度。

trans-unit.source: This command requests a prediction of what would happen if you submitted the command: "clear-content c:\temp\* -include smp* -exclude *2*".
trans-unit.target: 此命令要求預測如果您送出命令，會發生什麼事情: 「 純文字內容 c:\temp\* -包括 smp* -排除 *2 *"。

trans-unit.source: The result lists the files that would be cleared; in this case, files in the Temp directory whose names begin with "Smp", unless the file names include a "2".
trans-unit.target: 結果會列出會被清除的檔案；在此案例中是 Temp 目錄中名稱開頭為 "Smp" 的檔案，檔案名稱包含 "2" 的檔案除外。

trans-unit.source: To execute the command, run it again without the Whatif parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果要執行此命令，請在不包含 Whatif 參數的情況下再執行一次。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 "User01" 或 "Domain01\User01"，或輸入 PSCredential 物件，例如 Get-Credential Cmdlet 產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 若您輸入使用者名稱，將會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 與 Windows PowerShell 一起安裝的任何提供者皆不支援此參數。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Omits the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 省略指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供者的格式或語言指定篩選。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 篩選的語法 (包括是否使用萬用字元) 取決於提供者。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects, rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 篩選比其他參數更有效率，因為提供者會在抓取物件時套用篩選，而不是讓 Windows PowerShell 抓取物件後篩選。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Allows the cmdlet to clear the file contents even if the file is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 允許 Cmdlet 清除檔案內容 (即使是唯讀檔案)。

trans-unit.source: Implementation varies from provider to provider.
trans-unit.target: 實作會依提供者而異。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: Even using the Force parameter, the cmdlet cannot override security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 Force 參數，Cmdlet 仍然無法覆寫安全性限制。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Clears only the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 只清除指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths to the items from which content is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要從中刪除內容之項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Path, the value of LiteralPath is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 與 Path 不同，LiteralPath 將完全依照其輸入值來使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths to the items from which content is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要從中刪除內容之項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The paths must be paths to items, not to containers.
trans-unit.target: 路徑需為項目的路徑，而非容器的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, you must specify a path to one or more files, not a path to a directory.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您必須指定一或多個檔案的路徑，而非目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required, but the parameter name ("Path") is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數，但是參數名稱 ("Path") 為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: -Stream
trans-unit.target: 資料流

trans-unit.source: {{Fill Stream Description}}
trans-unit.target: {{填滿資料流描述}}

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to Clear-Content.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線將物件傳送至 Clear-Content。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any objects.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會傳回任何物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Clear-Content by its built-in alias, "clc".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用內建的別名 "clc" 來參照 Clear-Content。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the -Path parameter name, the value of Path must be the first parameter in the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略 -Path 參數名稱，Path 值必須是命令中的第一個參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, "clear-content c:\mydir\*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，「 純文字內容 c:\mydir\*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: If you include the parameter name, you can list the parameters in any order.
trans-unit.target: 如果您包含參數名稱，您可依任何順序列出參數。

trans-unit.source: You can use Clear-Content with the Windows PowerShell FileSystem provider and with other providers that manipulate content.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Clear-Content 搭配 Windows PowerShell FileSystem 提供者和管理內容的其他提供者。

trans-unit.source: To clear items that are not considered to be content, such as items managed by the Windows PowerShell Certificate or Registry providers, use Clear-Item.
trans-unit.target: 如果要清除不被視為內容的項目，例如 Windows PowerShell 憑證或登錄提供者所管理的項目，請使用 Clear-Item。

trans-unit.source: The Clear-Content cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content Cmdlet 是針對與任何提供者公開的資料搭配使用所設計。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PsProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 "Get-PsProvider"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
